# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_triggers/godherja/GH_magic_aspect_triggers.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .
fire_aspect_skill_trigger = {
	custom_description = {
		text = fire_greater_or_equal
		subject = this
		value = $VALUE$
		fire_aspect_spellcasting_value >= $VALUE$
	}
}

	custom_description = {
		text = water_greater_or_equal
		subject = this
		value = $VALUE$
		water_aspect_spellcasting_value >= $VALUE$
	}
}

		subject = this
		value = $VALUE$
		dawn_aspect_spellcasting_value >= $VALUE$
	}
}

knows_magic_school_with_aspect_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:fire }
		knows_magic_school_with_fire_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:water }
		knows_magic_school_with_water_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:ice }
		knows_magic_school_with_ice_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:air }
		knows_magic_school_with_air_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:stone }
		knows_magic_school_with_stone_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:dream }
		knows_magic_school_with_dream_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:celestial }
		knows_magic_school_with_celestial_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:dark }
		knows_magic_school_with_dark_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:light }
		knows_magic_school_with_light_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:blood }
		knows_magic_school_with_blood_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:nature }
		knows_magic_school_with_nature_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:ethereal }
		knows_magic_school_with_ethereal_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:hymns }
		knows_magic_school_with_hymns_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:death }
		knows_magic_school_with_death_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:sand }
		knows_magic_school_with_sand_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:metal }
		knows_magic_school_with_metal_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:time }
		knows_magic_school_with_time_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { $ASPECT$ = flag:dawn }
		knows_magic_school_with_dawn_aspect_trigger = yes
	}
}
knows_magic_school_with_fire_aspect_trigger = {
	custom_description = {
		text = knows_school_with_fire
		subject = this
		has_variable_list = known_magic_school_list
		any_in_list = {
			variable = known_magic_school_list
			exists = var:fire
		}
	}
}
knows_magic_school_with_water_aspect_trigger = {
	custom_description = {
		text = knows_school_with_water
		subject = this
		has_variable_list = known_magic_school_list
		any_in_list = {
			variable = known_magic_school_list
			exists = var:water
		}
	}
}

		any_in_list = {
			variable = known_magic_school_list
			exists = var:ice
		}
	}

		text = knows_school_with_dawn
		subject = this
		has_variable_list = known_magic_school_list
		any_in_list = {
			variable = known_magic_school_list
			exists = var:dawn
		}
	}
}

# Use when the trigger doesn't need to be properly localized. Otherwise, use the above effects
knows_magic_school_with_aspect_at_level_trigger = {
	has_variable_list = known_magic_school_list
	any_in_list = {
		variable = known_magic_school_list
		exists = var:$ASPECT$
		var:$ASPECT$ >= $VALUE$
	}
}

spell_ingredient_is_activated_by_aspect_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:fire }
		scope:spell_being_casted.fire_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:water }
		scope:spell_being_casted.water_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:ice }
		scope:spell_being_casted.ice_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:air }
		scope:spell_being_casted.air_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:stone }
		scope:spell_being_casted.stone_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:dream }
		scope:spell_being_casted.dream_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:celestial }
		scope:spell_being_casted.celestial_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:dark }
		scope:spell_being_casted.dark_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:light }
		scope:spell_being_casted.light_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:blood }
		scope:spell_being_casted.blood_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:nature }
		scope:spell_being_casted.nature_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:ethereal }
		scope:spell_being_casted.ethereal_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:hymns }
		scope:spell_being_casted.hymns_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:death }
		scope:spell_being_casted.death_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:sand }
		scope:spell_being_casted.sand_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:metal }
		scope:spell_being_casted.metal_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:time }
		scope:spell_being_casted.time_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { var:$NAME$_condition_aspect = flag:dawn }
		scope:spell_being_casted.dawn_aspect_total_spell_level_value > var:$NAME$_condition_value
	}
}

# Scope: Character      - Character whose aspect skills to compare
# ASPECT_LHS            - left-hand side aspect
# ASPECT_RHS_FLAG: Flag - flag representing right-hand side aspect
aspect_spellcasting_value_greater_than_flag_trigger = {
	switch = {
		trigger = $ASPECT_RHS_FLAG$

		flag:fire = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > fire_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:water = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > water_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:ice = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > ice_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:air = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > air_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:stone = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > stone_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:dream = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > dream_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:celestial = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > celestial_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:dark = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > dark_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:light = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > light_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:blood = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > blood_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:nature = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > nature_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:ethereal = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > ethereal_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:hymns = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > hymns_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:death = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > death_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:sand = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > sand_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:metal = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > metal_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:time = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > time_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		flag:dawn = {
			$ASPECT_LHS$_aspect_spellcasting_value > dawn_aspect_spellcasting_value
		}

		fallback = {
			always = no
		}
	}
}
